description: On an avarturine background of reddish copper and pattern of hexagons in honeycomb fashion, each containing a square; the pattern in yellow bronze lacquer; the crest of the Tokugwa family, three asarum leaves their points together, within a circle, appear once on each end, twice on top and each side
medium: Wood, lacquer, mountings of chased and gilded bronze
title: Chest of a Daimyo
